summary: REQ-6 and REQ-7 appear to be implemented via a new time-expired game-over reason and UI messaging, plus changes intended to keep obstacles (including boss obstacles) rendered during the 'exploding' transition when time reaches 0. However, the diff also includes several unrelated gameplay-tuning and documentation/state-file changes not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Gameplay tuning changes unrelated to obstacle visibility at time end or displaying a 'TIME UP!' message (e.g., jet/bullet/obstacle constants like size, speed, cooldown).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly focused on obstacle visibility during time-expired transitions and adding a time-expired reason/message; it does not request balance or tuning adjustments.
evidence: frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx (constants: JET_SIZE, BULLET_SPEED, FIRE_COOLDOWN, BASE_MOVEMENT_SPEED, OBSTACLE_SPEED, etc.)

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project tracking/state file (adding AR-1/AR-2 entries marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project_state.json or any project-management metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad claims/notes about many other frontend files and features (tailwind tokens, physics helpers, joystick deadzone, explosion variants, etc.) beyond the requested fix scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: These are not requested features; even if they are only documentation, they introduce unrelated feature descriptions into the repo via the modified summary file.
